mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, CONTENTS, TITLE FROM PJ_BOARD

SELECT a.rn, a.userId, a.title, a.contents, a.articleDate FROM ( SELECT a.rn, a.userId, a.title, a.contents, a.articleDate FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, USER_ID userId, TITLE title, CONTENTS contents, ARTICLE_DATE articleDate FROM PJ_BOARD) a WHERE rn <= 10 * #{pageNum}) a WHERE rn > 10 * (#{pageNum} - 1)
